div.p: This code system http://linuxforhealth.org/fhir/cdm/CodeSystem/process-meta-source-classification defines the following codes:

tr.td: Primary data that originates from the source system of record or the data integrator.
Derived data produced by a data processor that interprets, aggregates or in some other way enhances the source data.

title.value: Classification of the origin of data

description.value: Identifies the class of origin of the data elements

definition.value: Primary data that originates from the source system of record or the data integrator.
Derived data produced by a data processor that interprets, aggregates or in some other way enhances the source data.
